name: Pixel persuit
description:
How to play :  Increase speed by press A or Left click syncing the music beat and use mouse to control a player and avoid obstacle and try not to get caught by police or guardian until the song ends. (Song duration : stage 1 is 1 min 13 sec, stage 2 is 1 min 31 sec)

This game i made for Bored pixel jam. You play as an underground hoverboard racer who hired to do illegal jobs by criminals. 

Sorry for no web version of this game because on web version music and game are not syncing correctly for some reason.

Credits : 

  • Music by iLikeCola12 (Youtube/ Soundcloud)
  • Font by Fonts for Flash (1001fonts)
